text:
Whether it was ideology or incompetence, this is total crazy! As with so many things, we are stronger working together in the face of threats that don't respect borders. 🇪🇺🇬🇧
https://t.co/oqFu6dYgqd

urls.description: British government is facing criticism for not taking part in joint purchase of supplies amid the coronavirus pandemic
